item.title: 巴西通胀降温，预示高利率已见成效
item.description: 由于高利率开始使拉丁美洲最大经济体的物价降温，巴西 10 月份的年度通胀放缓幅度超过预期。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation slowed more than expected in October, as high interest rates begin to cool prices in Latin America’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 亚洲大型液化天然气买家已为冬季做好准备
item.description: 如果天气预报准确，中国和日本在未来几个月内将不会急需进入现货市场。【原文：If weather forecasts prove accurate, China and Japan will have no urgent need to dip into the spot market over the next few months.】

item.title: Nebius 销售额飙升，Neocloud 提供商与 Meta 签订人工智能协议
item.description: Nebius Group NV 第三季度销售额飙升了 300% 以上，因为这家荷兰新云提供商宣布与 Meta Platforms 公司达成人工智能基础设施交易，并预测到 2026 年将实现快速增长。【原文：Nebius Group NV third-quarter sales soared by more than 300% as the Dutch neocloud provider announced an artificial intelligence infrastructure deal with Meta Platforms Inc. and predicted rapid growth through 2026.】

item.title: 任天堂软件销售跟不上硬件热潮
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，望月隆志（Takashi Mochizuki）和弗拉德-萨沃夫（Vlad Savov）将探讨任天堂光明地平线上的一抹微云。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Takashi Mochizuki and Vlad Savov look at the tiny slivers of cloud on Nintendo’s bright horizon.】

item.title: 贝森特踏上了绊倒耶伦的信息传递之路
item.description: 美国财政部正在启动一项宣传活动，以展示总统签名立法的经济效益。【原文：The US Treasury is kicking off a messaging campaign to showcase the economic benefits of the president’s signature legislation.】

item.title: 特朗普发出瑞士和印度贸易协议取得进展的信号
item.description: 艰苦卓绝的谈判似乎即将取得突破，从而降低天价关税税率【原文：Grueling negotiations appear to be nearing a breakthrough that lowers their sky-high tariff rates】

item.title: 巴西央行坚信 15%的利率将抑制通货膨胀
item.description: 根据上周政策决定的会议记录，巴西央行表示，随着当地经济降温，将利率维持在近二十年的高位将减缓通货膨胀，这一点已得到更多保证。【原文：Brazil’s central bank said it’s more assured that keeping the interest rate at a nearly two-decade high will slow inflation as the local economy cools, according to the minutes of last week’s policy decision.】

item.title: 首席执行官对 2007 年以来经济放缓的担忧最小
item.description: 尽管贸易紧张局势挥之不去，股票估值也显得捉襟见肘，但在这个财报季，公司高管们对经济的看法却异常乐观。【原文：Company executives are sounding remarkably upbeat about the economy this earnings season, even as trade tensions linger and stock valuations look stretched.】

item.title: 爆炸震撼印度和巴基斯坦首都，加剧紧张局势
item.description: 印度和巴基斯坦两国首都在 24 小时内相继发生致命爆炸，造成至少 20 人死亡，数人受伤，加剧了人们对这对拥有核武器的邻国之间紧张局势再度升级的担忧。【原文：Deadly explosions in the capitals of India and Pakistan within 24 hours of each other killed at least 20 people and left several injured, heightening concern of renewed tensions between the nuclear-armed neighbors.】

item.title: 竞争激烈，新加坡海洋公司利润未达预期
item.description: Sea Ltd. 的季度利润未能达到分析师的预期，此前该公司增加了支出，以便在东南亚残酷的电子商务市场上与竞争对手一决高下。【原文：Sea Ltd.’s quarterly profit missed analysts’ estimates after the company boosted spending to battle competitors in Southeast Asia’s cut-throat e-commerce market.】

item.title: 股票无法超越的简单美元交易
item.description:
美元正在重夺全球最具吸引力资产之一的桂冠。【原文：

The greenback is regaining its crown as one of the world’s most appealing assets.

】

item.title: 泰国根据其零关税承诺向美国玉米敞开大门
item.description: 泰国计划明年取消征税并大幅扩大饲料玉米进口配额，为美国供应腾出空间，这也是泰国在美国贸易谈判中做出的让步之一。【原文：Thailand plans to scrap levies and sharply expand its feed-corn import quota next year to make room for American supplies, part of its concessions in US trade negotiations.】

item.title: 新谈判开始之际，乌克兰预算措施引起国际货币基金组织警觉
item.description: 在国际货币基金组织开始与这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家就新的四年期贷款方案进行谈判之际，该组织对乌克兰的一系列预算措施表示担忧。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is raising concerns about a range of Ukrainian budget measures as the lender begins talks with the war-battered nation on a new four-year loan package.】

item.title: 中国人民银行为创纪录收缩后的贷款放缓辩解
item.description: 继今年早些时候贷款出现创纪录的萎缩之后，中国央行消除了人们对新贷款放缓的担忧，因为经济正在从旧的增长动力转型。【原文：China’s central bank dismissed concerns over a slowdown in new loans while the economy transitions away from old growth drivers, following a record contraction in lending earlier this year.】

item.title: WhatsApp 将在欧盟面临更严格的内容审核规则
item.description: 随着欧盟加强对社交媒体的审查，Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Meta Platforms Inc.’s messaging service WhatsApp will face stricter rules under the European Union’s content moderation rulebook, as the bloc increases scrutiny of social media.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利采用 KKR 支持的财富技术加快交易速度
item.description: 摩根士丹利正在采用由 KKR & Co.公司支持的技术，该技术将帮助银行促进另类资产管理公司的交易，这些公司希望扩大与高净值个人的接触。【原文：Morgan Stanley is adopting technology backed by KKR & Co. that will help the bank facilitate transactions from alternative asset managers looking to expand their access to high-net-worth individuals.】

item.title: 美国小型企业对盈利的乐观程度降至六个月低点
item.description: 由于收益恶化和对经济的乐观程度下降，美国小型企业的信心在 10 月份降至六个月来的最低点。【原文：Sentiment among US small businesses eased in October to a six-month low on a deterioration in earnings and less optimism about the economy.】

item.title: 马达加斯加计划在 2026 年筹集创纪录的 19 亿美元借款
item.description: 马达加斯加计划明年主要通过多边贷款筹集 8.65 万亿阿里亚里（19 亿美元）的资金，比今年计划的借款额高出五分之一。【原文：Madagascar plans to raise 8.65 trillion ariary ($1.9 billion) next year chiefly through multilateral loans, a fifth more than it plans to borrow in the current year.】

item.title: 英国央行行长格林淡化英国失业率上升，称薪资增长令人担忧
item.description: 英国央行决策者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）表示，尽管周二的数据显示英国失业率攀升至大流行病以来的最高水平，但她仍支持维持利率不变。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Megan Greene signaled she continues to back keeping interest rates on hold, despite figures Tuesday showing UK unemployment climbing to its highest rate since the pandemic.】

item.title: 前橄榄球运动员的安保公司 Fidelity 计划在南非上市
item.description: 南非最大的私人证券公司富达服务集团（Fidelity Services Group）首席执行官瓦尔-巴特曼（Wahl Bartmann）表示，该公司已聘请贷款机构为其在非洲大陆最大证券交易所的首次公开募股提供建议。【原文：Fidelity Services Group, South Africa’s biggest private-security company, hired lenders to advise on an initial public offering on the continent’s largest bourse, Chief Executive Officer Wahl Bartmann said.】

item.title: Point72 的 Turion 基金在人工智能股票热潮中取得 30% 的收益
item.description: Point72 资产管理公司（Point72 Asset Management）新推出的人工智能选股基金今年已实现约 30% 的收益，原因是对该技术的炒作推动了与人工智能相关的企业估值飙升。【原文：Point72 Asset Management’s new AI-focused stock-picking fund has delivered gains of about 30% this year as hype around the technology fueled a surge in AI-linked corporate valuations.】

item.title: 人工智能支出面临严格审查，苹果公司的克制态度受到追捧
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）因没有像其大科技竞争对手那样积极地在人工智能领域投入资金而受到华尔街的大量批评。但这一战略突然成为这家 iPhone 制造商的福音。【原文：Apple Inc. has faced plenty of criticism from Wall Street for not spending as aggressively on artificial intelligence as its Big Tech rivals. But that strategy is suddenly a blessing for the iPhone maker.】

item.title: 微软将投资 100 亿美元在葡萄牙建设人工智能数据中心
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）表示，将斥资 100 亿美元在葡萄牙海岸建造一个人工智能数据中心，这是该公司今年在欧洲最大的投资项目之一。【原文：Microsoft Corp. will spend $10 billion on an artificial intelligence data center along the Portuguese coast, marking one of its largest European investments this year, the company said.】

item.title: 停摆期间股市反弹，但华尔街期待更多涨幅
item.description: 美国政府停摆是历史上最长的一次，股市在今年经历了一系列挑战后又迎来了一次反弹。自 10 月 1 日美国政府关门以来的 40 天里，S&P 500 指数上涨了 0.6%，而在周一政府关门看起来肯定会在几天内结束后，股市又上涨了更多。【原文：Add the longest US government shutdown in history to the list of challenges the stock market has rallied through this year. The S&P 500 added 0.6% in the 40 days since the US government closed Oct. 1, then rallied by a greater amount Monday after it looked certain to end within days.】

item.title: 各国将美元贷款换成人民币，国际货币基金组织（IMF）发出货币风险信号
item.description: 国际货币基金组织警告说，肯尼亚和埃塞俄比亚等国正在将从中国获得的美元贷款换成人民币，以降低债务成本，这将带来货币风险。【原文：The International Monetary Fund has warned of currency risks arising for nations such as Kenya and Ethiopia that are swapping dollar loans from China into yuan to tame debt costs.】

item.title: 德国投资者信心下滑，扭亏希望受挫
item.description: 投资者对德国经济的信心出乎意料地下滑，打击了人们对德国经济终于开始好转的乐观情绪。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economy unexpectedly slipped, damping optimism that the country’s fortunes are finally starting to improve.】

item.title: 德国化工行业引用上世纪 90 年代的说唱歌曲凸显不景气
item.description: 德国饱受打击的化工行业引用了一首 20 世纪 90 年代的说唱歌曲，以显示其如今的境况有多么糟糕。【原文：Germany’s battered chemicals industry evoked a 1990s rap song to show just how badly it’s faring these days.】

item.title: 南非失业率今年首次下降
item.description: 由于建筑、社区和贸易行业增加了就业岗位，南非第三季度的失业率在今年首次出现下降。【原文：South Africa’s unemployment rate dropped for the first time this year in the third quarter as the construction, community and trade industries added jobs.】

item.title: Nexon 预测《枫之谷》和《ARC 攻略》的利润将创历史新高
item.description: Nexon Co.预计全年营业利润将创下历史新高，这主要得益于韩国市场对其长期经营的《枫之谷》（MapleStory）系列游戏的需求激增，以及北美和欧洲市场对其新游戏《ARC Raiders》的需求激增。【原文：Nexon Co. expects to post a record full-year operating profit, driven by surging demand for its long-running MapleStory franchise in Korea and its new title ARC Raiders in North America and Europe.】

item.title: 挪威暂停石油基金道德规范，避免了价值 2300 亿美元的技术出售
item.description: 挪威财政大臣延斯-斯托尔滕贝格（Jens Stoltenberg）表示，在剥离卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.【原文：Norwegian Finance Minister Jens Stoltenberg said politicians suspended ethics rules governing the world’s biggest sovereign wealth fund after the divestment of Caterpillar Inc. stock stoked fears of a firesale of tech holdings, worth as much as $230 billion.】
